text: Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 72. Walking beside a path, I will not teach Dhamma to a person walking on the path who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๗๒. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราเดินไปนอกทางจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่คนไม่เจ็บไข้ ผู้ไปอยู่ในทาง”
72. I shall not while walking beside a path teach Dhamma to one walking on a path who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
